summary: Email correspondence between an Assistant United States Attorney and another party regarding technical issues with a video file intended for use in a meeting with attorneys for a witness. The email discusses attempts to fix a glitchy video file previously converted by litigation support.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: Author of email seeking technical assistance with a video file to be used in a meeting with attorneys for a witness.

events.title: Video file technical discussion
events.description: Email exchange about technical issues with a video file intended for use in a meeting with attorneys for a witness.

locations: One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: An Assistant United States Attorney was preparing to use a video file in a meeting with attorneys for a witness.
The video file had technical issues described as 'glitchy' despite previous conversion by litigation support.
The correspondence suggests ongoing legal proceedings involving witness preparation in July 2019.
The email exchange reveals coordination between prosecutors and technical support for evidentiary materials.
